object_name.value: Validate document is linked to restricted security model

'$value(security_model)' Security Model applied to the document is Restricted Security Model.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select r_object_id from lss_sec_secmodel where security_model = '$value(security_model)' and restriction_level=0)
